payload.name: rag-is-cache-coherence
payload.title: RAG is cache coherence: versioning, invalidation, budgets
payload.formal: coherence requires: versions, invalidation rules, bounded staleness.
payload.apm2_mapping: retrieval must be content-addressed, version-pinned, and budgeted. ContextPack compilation is coherence: it pins roots and resolves transitive dependencies deterministically. Treat “stale context” as a coherence bug, not “model weirdness.”
